text: @DHSCgovuk @PHE_uk @CMO_England @NHSEngland @CathCalderwood1 @scotgovhealth @CMOWales @PublicHealthW @publichealthni @healthdpt I’ve been comparing Q1 mortality with recent years &there isn’t much difference -so far. But there could well be over-reporting of covid deaths where deaths of covid positive cases are included even though the death is actually due to something else- https://t.co/qCqxfkH7n4

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
